main event: The report describes a UFO sighting in West Bloomfield, Michigan in May 1955, where lights were observed descending rapidly and then accelerating in level flight.
interesting points: The UFOs were described as circular, basketball-sized, and flight red, with no photographs taken.
The objects were observed moving rapidly at high altitudes in a northern direction.
The observer was a 34-year-old civilian housewife.
The report mentions the presence of overcast scattered high overcast and calm surface winds during the sighting.
sighted object: unknown circular, basketball-sized flight red objects
